properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior Savior Hear my humble cry While on others Thou art calling Do not pass me by{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pass me not O gentle Savior Hear my humble cry While on others Thou art calling Do not pass me by{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let me at Thy throne of mercy Find a sweet relief Kneeling there In deep contrition Help my unbelief{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Trusting only in Thy merit Would I seek Thy face Heal my wounded broken spirit Save me by Thy grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou the Spring Of all my comfort More than life to me Whom have I on earth Beside Thee Whom in heaven but Thee{/lang-eng}
